definitions.definition: have an obligation to pay or repay (something, especially money) in return for something received.
examples: they have denied they owe money to the company
synonyms: be under an obligation to "I don't want to owe anyone"

examples: I owe you for the taxi

definitions.definition: be under a moral obligation to give someone (gratitude, respect, etc.).
examples: I owe it to him to explain what's happened

definitions.definition: have something because of (someone or something).
examples: he owed his success not to chance but to insight

definitions.definition: be indebted to someone or something for (something).
examples: I owe my life to you
